TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PropertyInformation extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains meta-information on an individual property within the configuration. This type cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The PropertyInformation object contains the meta-information of an individual property within the configuration. This object can be used when validating and changing the properties of an individual attribute.
The PropertyInformation object is derived from the associated <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection> object. The <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection> object is derived from the associated <xref:System.Configuration.ElementInformation> object.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the PropertyInformation type.
[!code-cs[System.Configuration.PropertyInformation#1](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.configuration.p_5_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.PropertyInformation#1](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.configuration.p_5_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets the object related to the configuration attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> object is used to guide how the value of an attribute can be modified.

Docs.summary: Gets an object containing the default value related to a configuration attribute.
Docs.value: An object containing the default value of the configuration attribute.

remarks.format:

Docs.returns: An object containing the default value of the configuration attribute.

Docs.summary: Gets the description of the object that corresponds to a configuration attribute.
Docs.value: The description of the configuration attribute.
Docs.returns: The description of the configuration attribute.

Docs.summary: Gets a value specifying whether the configuration attribute is a key.
Docs.value: if the configuration attribute is a key; otherwise, .

remarks.format:

Docs.summary: Gets a value specifying whether the configuration attribute is locked.
Docs.value: if the object is locked; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The IsLocked property returns `true` when the related element is locked by the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAttributes%2A> or <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAllAttributesExcept%2A> property.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the IsLocked property. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation> class.

Docs.returns: if the object is locked; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets the line number in the configuration file related to the configuration attribute.
Docs.value: A line number of the configuration file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The line number associated with the source configuration file. Zero is returned when there is no source configuration file.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the LineNumber property. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation> class.
[!code-cs[System.Configuration.PropertyInformation#7](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/p-system.configuration.p_7_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.PropertyInformation#7](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/p-system.configuration.p_7_1.vb)]

Docs.returns: A line number of the configuration file.

Docs.summary: Gets a object related to the configuration attribute.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyValueOrigin> object describes how the value of the configuration attribute was determined.
